name: PM-Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
description: Provides ₹6,000 per year in three installments to small and marginal farmers.
details: This scheme aims to provide direct income support to all landholding farmers to help them manage financial needs for agricultural and allied activities.

name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
description: Crop insurance scheme to protect farmers from losses due to natural disasters.
details: The scheme provides financial support to farmers suffering from crop loss or damage due to unforeseen events like droughts, floods, and other calamities.

name: Kisan Credit Card (KCC) Scheme
description: Provides farmers with low-interest credit for agricultural needs.
details: The KCC scheme allows farmers to avail short-term loans with flexible repayment terms to meet farming expenses.

name: Soil Health Card Scheme
description: Helps farmers analyze soil quality and improve productivity.
details: The scheme provides farmers with soil health reports to guide appropriate fertilizer use for better crop yield.

name: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana (PKVY)
description: Promotes organic farming through traditional and natural methods.
details: This scheme encourages farmers to adopt organic farming and avoid synthetic fertilizers and pesticides.

name: National Agriculture Market (eNAM)
description: An online trading platform for better price discovery and marketing of agricultural produce.
details: The eNAM platform connects farmers with traders and buyers across India for better pricing and market reach.

name: Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana (RKVY)
description: Provides states with flexible funding to enhance agricultural productivity.
details: RKVY aims to strengthen farming infrastructure and technology for sustainable agricultural growth.

name: Micro Irrigation Fund (MIF)
description: Supports drip and sprinkler irrigation for efficient water use.
details: The fund provides financial assistance to farmers adopting micro-irrigation techniques to reduce water wastage.

name: National Mission for Sustainable Agriculture (NMSA)
description: Promotes climate-resilient agriculture through sustainable practices.
details: NMSA focuses on water conservation, soil health, and climate adaptation for long-term agricultural sustainability.

name: Agri-Clinics and Agri-Business Centres Scheme
description: Supports agripreneurs in setting up advisory and business centers for farmers.
details: This scheme helps agriculture graduates establish businesses to provide farmers with technical guidance and services.

name: Dairy Entrepreneurship Development Scheme (DEDS)
description: Encourages dairy farming through financial assistance.
details: The scheme offers loans and subsidies for setting up dairy farms and modernizing milk production facilities.

name: National Food Security Mission (NFSM)
description: Aims to increase food grain production through sustainable methods.
details: NFSM provides financial support for improved seed distribution, soil fertility enhancement, and better irrigation.

name: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana (PMKSY)
description: Ensures efficient irrigation and water conservation for farmers.
details: PMKSY focuses on water conservation, micro-irrigation, and efficient water management for sustainable farming.

name: Livestock Insurance Scheme
description: Provides insurance coverage for cattle, buffaloes, and other livestock.
details: The scheme protects farmers from financial losses due to the death of insured livestock.

name: Operation Greens
description: Aims to stabilize the supply of Tomato, Onion, and Potato (TOP) crops.
details: The scheme provides subsidies for storage, transportation, and processing of perishable crops.

name: Agricultural Mechanization Program
description: Promotes the use of advanced farming equipment.
details: The program provides financial aid for purchasing modern agricultural machinery like tractors and harvesters.

name: Agriculture Infrastructure Fund (AIF)
description: Provides financial support for building agricultural infrastructure like cold storage and warehouses.
details: AIF offers low-interest loans to develop post-harvest management and community farming assets.

name: Sub-Mission on Agricultural Mechanization (SMAM)
description: Encourages mechanization to improve farm productivity.
details: The scheme provides subsidies for modern farm equipment like tractors, harvesters, and seed drills.

name: Blue Revolution
description: Promotes sustainable fisheries development.
details: The scheme aims to enhance fish production through improved aquaculture techniques and better market linkages.

name: National Beekeeping & Honey Mission (NBHM)
description: Supports beekeeping and honey production for additional farm income.
details: NBHM provides training, infrastructure, and financial support for beekeepers.

name: Rashtriya Gokul Mission
description: Improves indigenous cattle breeds and dairy productivity.
details: The scheme promotes the breeding of indigenous cows and enhances milk production.

name: Organic Farming Promotion Scheme
description: Encourages farmers to adopt organic farming practices.
details: Provides training, certification, and financial aid to transition to organic farming.

name: National Horticulture Mission (NHM)
description: Supports the development of the horticulture sector.
details: NHM offers financial aid for fruit and vegetable cultivation, greenhouse farming, and cold storage.

name: PM Formalization of Micro Food Processing Enterprises (PM-FME)
description: Provides financial support for food processing enterprises.
details: The scheme assists small food processing businesses with credit-linked subsidies and skill training.

name: Watershed Development Programme
description: Promotes soil and water conservation in rain-fed areas.
details: The program enhances land productivity through water harvesting, afforestation, and soil improvement techniques.

name: Attracting and Retaining Youth in Agriculture (ARYA)
description: Encourages young entrepreneurs in the agriculture sector.
details: ARYA supports rural youth with training and financial assistance for agribusiness startups.
